newsitem.title: SLOVAKIA: SLOVAK FINMIN 1-YR BOND AVERAGE YIELD HITS 20.35PCT.
newsitem.headline: SLOVAK FINMIN 1-YR BOND AVERAGE YIELD HITS 20.35PCT.

text.p: finance ministry auction of one-year 11 percent state bonds on
Tuesday rose to 20.349 percent from 19.388 percent in the last
auction of similar bonds on August 5, the central bank (NBS)
The ministry acepted bids worth 2.38 billion crowns with
Minimum accepted yield was 19.301 percent while the maximum
yield hit 21.40 percent, the NBS, which conducted the auction,
The ministry does not set an amount on offer in state
securities auctions, nor does it set a minimum or maximum limit
It uses T-bills and state bonds as the main tools to cover
the state budget deficit, which widened to 17.936 billion
crowns for the first seven months of this year from 13.209
billion in the January-June period of 1997.
